context: Tests whether the agent generates a speaker profile JSON following the skill's comprehensive schema, including all required sections, correct data mapping from vault sources, and personalized badge generation.

checklist.name: Schema version
checklist.description: The profile includes 'schema_version': 1 at the top level

checklist.name: Speaker section
checklist.description: Profile includes a 'speaker' section with at least: name, handle, website, and shownotes_url_pattern populated from the tracking database config

checklist.name: Infrastructure section
checklist.description: Profile includes an 'infrastructure' section with at least: template_pptx_path and font_pair information

checklist.name: Presentation modes array
checklist.description: Profile includes a 'presentation_modes' array with at least 2 distinct modes, each having an id, name, description, and humor_register

checklist.name: Design rules section
checklist.description: Profile includes 'design_rules' with at least: background_color_strategy, footer object, and slide_numbers field

checklist.name: Rhetoric defaults
checklist.description: Profile includes 'rhetoric_defaults' with at least: default_opening, three_part_close, and on_slide_profanity preference

checklist.name: Confirmed intents preserved
checklist.description: Profile includes 'confirmed_intents' array containing the 4 intents from the tracking database (delayed intro, anti-sell, three-point close, profanity rule)

checklist.name: Guardrail sources
checklist.description: Profile includes 'guardrail_sources' with a 'slide_budgets' array containing entries for different duration ranges AND a 'recurring_issues' array

checklist.name: Instrument catalog
checklist.description: Profile includes 'instrument_catalog' with at least: opening_patterns, humor_techniques, closing_patterns, and verbal_signatures arrays

checklist.name: Publishing process
checklist.description: Profile includes a 'publishing_process' section (may be partially empty if not fully configured, but the section exists)

checklist.name: Badges section
checklist.description: Profile includes a 'badges' section with at least 3 personalized entries that reference actual data from the vault (e.g., meme counts, talk counts, specific speaker quirks)

checklist.name: Talks analyzed count
checklist.description: Profile includes 'talks_analyzed' with the correct count matching the number of processed talks in the tracking database (12)
